title: EVALUATED_FIELD_VALUE
description: Returns the value that was evaluated for the specified target field earlier in the current mapping logic.

parameters.name: mapped_target_field_name
parameters.description: The API name of the target field to retrieve value from.

examples.code: -- TotalPrice is calculated first, then uses that value in Description.

children.text: This function works like sequence numbers to control the order in which fields are evaluated.
It ensures that dependent fields are calculated after their dependencies when no explicit sequence is set.
When multiple source records map to one target record, the target record is processed multiple times.
Each processing iteration can access values from previous iterations.
Without conditional logic, later iterations will overwrite values from earlier iterations.
